name: Slackforce
description: Simple message broker to enable Slack to Salesforce communication using Slash Commands

CLIENT_ID.description: Client Id of your Salesforce Connected App

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Secret of your Salesforce Connected App

USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for your integration user

PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for your integration user

OPPORTUNITY_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the pipeline slash command

CONTACT_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the contact slash command

CASE_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the case slash command

USER_SECURITY_TOKEN.description: Security Token generated by Salesforce for this user

SLACK_SECURITY_TOKEN.description: Security Token generated by Slack for the Web API
